body.name: eos Cashmere Skin Collection Shave Butter- Vanilla Cashmere Scented, Non-Foaming Shave Cream, 7 fl oz
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35

features: VANILLA CASHMERE: Our sweet and nuzzly Vanilla Cashmere scent captures the warmth of whipped vanilla, the softness of musk, and the coziness of caramel for a rich, luxurious fragrance with a sensual twist
SECOND STEP FOR 24-HOUR HYDRATION: Our Cashmere Shave Butter protects, nourishes & prevents irritation from shaving
ENTIRE BIKINI AREA APPROVED: This rich-moisturizing, non-foaming shave butter protects skin from irritation and razor burn, while delivering glide & a smooth, protective shave

CASHMERE SMOOTH COMPLEX: Our formula contains a blend of the most naturally moisturizing & protective butters for velvety soft, cashmere smooth skin: shea butter softens & nourishes, cocoa butter deeply hydrates while argan butter soothes & makes skin smooth
OUR PROMISE: Cashmere Skin Collection is dermatologist-recommended & made for sensitive skin, paraben & phthalate-free, & cruelty-free
COMPLETE THE REGIMEN: Pair our Shave Butter with our Sugar Scrub & Body Cream to achieve cashmere smooth skin
body.description: Wrap your skin in cashmere with our Cashmere Skin Collection! Our Shave Butter is formulated to help your razor effortlessly glide over skin, replenish & nourish skin while shaving and reduce skin redness and irregularities for even tone and texture. Our Shave Butter is infused with protective ingredients like avocado butter, hydrating cupuaçu butter & soothing aloe. This rich-moisturizing, non-foaming shave butter protects skin from irritation and razor burn, while delivering glide & a smooth, protective shave. The second step in our three-step skin care regiment for 72-hour hydration and cashmere smooth skin.* Cashmere Smooth™ complex formula contains a blend of the most naturally moisturizing & protective butters for velvety soft, cashmere smooth skin: shea butter softens & nourishes, cocoa butter deeply hydrates and argan butter soothes & smoothes. *after using all 3 products from our cashmere shave collection (eos pre-shave scrub, eos shave butter, eos post-shave smooth body cream)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Daughter likes it
reviews.reviewText: Got this for my daughter to use since she's a teen. I opened the pack when we got it to see how it smelled and it was actually pleasant. The combination of oils and butters are a good blend where it feels soft on your skin. She so far has no complaints about using it but says it's better than the generic stuff she got from the store recently which made her skin feel dry. This kept her skin moisturized and didn't cause a break out or any reactions. So far works for her. I do warn though, just because the oils work for her, sometimes not so much for others. It's a good product for her, but it may not be for someone else.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Amazingly Smooth, Controversial Scent
reviews.reviewText: I have been an EOS buyer for years and was so excited to try this new scent! I was unfortunately reminded of Vanilla Bean Noelle by Bath and Body Works, which gives me a migraine, despite being very feminine and cozy smelling. If you love that scent, this is almost an exact dupe! If you don't like it or have reacted to it, I'd steer clear. Scent aside, EOS shave creams are thick, moisturizing, and effective, and this one is no different. I didn't deal with any razor burn and my legs still feel soft days later.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love EOS, loved this
reviews.reviewText: EOS makes great lip balm. I wasn’t sure I was going to like this much as I’m fine with using soap to shave but was surprisingly impressed by this product. I love the vanilla fragrance which smelled almost almondy to me. It didn’t linger too long after … just enough. The product comes out thick like toothpaste and I lathered it onto my wet legs. It was soft and I found it easy to shave and also easy to see where I had shaved which is an advantage I hadn’t thought of. I really enjoyed this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smooth Shave, Intoxicating Scent
reviews.reviewText: It's my first time using an eos product but it won't be my last. This shave cream is fantastic! Although the product page describes it as a lotion, it is actually a thick, white cream. It spreads easily, enabling a close, comfortable shave. While I have long used a fragrance-free shave gel and been happy with it, the vanilla scent of this cream is intoxicating and does not bother my sensitive skin. In addition, it is full of butters, oils and petrolatum that combine into a hydrating blend. This product makes a shower feel luxurious.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars eos Cashmere Skin Collection Shave Butter- Vanilla Cashmere Scented, Non-Foaming Shave Cream
reviews.reviewText: I am not sure what I was expecting with this shave cream as I am not a big fan of shea butter but I was hoping that eos was able to do something I might like. The smell of shea butter is irritating and overpowering.Aside from the overpowering smell, I did like the cashmere feel to the shave butter. It was a bit more gentle and thicker than the store bought shave cream but it definitely didn't help reduce the number of razor burns I got, especially in the bikini line area. My skin did feel a bit softer and nicer to touch after the shave butter.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Underperforms Completely, but at least it Smells Like Cocoa Butter
reviews.reviewText: I love using shave butters, but I usually default to buying the cheapest store brand option I can get for the sake of my budget. I have used a few brands of shave butter over the years though that I really liked and preferred to basic shaving cream/foam. This eos Cashmere Skin Collection Vanilla Cashmere Scented Shave Butter is not one that I like very much or even prefer to my regular cheap shaving cream. There are a few reasons for this.Cons: It did not stop/improve any irritation or razor bumps. I generally only experience irritation when shaving around my bikini line (I do my best as time allows to exfoliate before and after, apply shaving cream/butter liberally, shave gently and slowly in the right direction, etc. but either way I always end up with some sort of irritation). I was hopeful that this eos shave butter would perform better and lessen the irritation I experience, but it was the same experience as always.- In the bathtub it balls up into little chunks when I go to rinse it that float around in the water. It has a hydrophobic quality to it that I assume causes it which grosses me out.-I also found that the hydrophobic quality which causes the non-foam production makes it feel less pleasant and gives a drier shave. With other shave butters I have been able to add a few drops of water to have it go further and allow the razor to glide more smoothly. I found that the razor did not glide as smoothly. As a result I noticed that I am not able to get as much of a close shave.-The Yuka app ( which allows you to scan products and its scoring system analyzes each ingredient for health or environmental impact) which I have come to depend on to see through the natural claims/fancy marketing of some companies gives this a score of only 7/100 due to several concerning ingredients.Pros: I love the strong smell of cocoa butter that this shave butter brings to the table. It smells great! It does make my skin feel slightly smoother and smell pleasant, but the results are not dramatic. Other than the pleasant smell, I found it unpleasant to use for the reasons listed above.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pit frosting! (vanilla cashmere)
reviews.reviewText: I used this under my arms and oh my goodness, it smells like vanilla frosting! It also looks like it too, so hard as it is, resist the urge to taste it. lolIt's thick and I probably could have used a lot less. No problems shaving with it, in fact, I have a couple of bumps under one armpit and had no issues with irritation. I seriously love this stuff!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I am a big fan of EOS and have been using their lip balms for years. Products are very clean and do not disappoint!
